text: læa cng raluk thung khna thi mu sa di klaw kæ klum chn khxng khea wa thæ cring xallxhˌ thrng baycha kæ phwk than hı cheuxd wawtawmeiy taw hnung phwk khea klaw wa than ca thux xea phwk rea pen thi lx len kranan hrux? Mu sa klaw wa chan khx khwam khum khrxng tx xallxhˌ hı phn cak kar thi chan ca pen phwk ngo khela beapayya
